text: Fox NASCAR, also known as NASCAR on Fox, is the brand name of NASCAR coverage provided by Fox Sports, that airs on Fox Sports 1, Fox Sports 2, and Fox, The network covers the first sixteen NASCAR Cup Series as well as fourteen NASCAR Xfinity Series races, and all 23 NASCAR Craftsman Truck Series races. == References == Category:2001 American television series debuts Category:2000s American television series Category:2010s American television series Category:Sports television series Category:Fox television series Category:NASCAR
title: Fox NASCAR
